full_threads.body: For CIBA. Please close once acknowledged / saved.

Hi – updates loaded -
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DhK2AFlv-OdhZYmu0UtCVu-FOo44HaZ5blH25_xPlBo/edit?usp=sharing



Hopefully it all makes sense!!



I’ve attached our new logo for reference – this isn’t the final version,
this is a mockup am awaiting final version and brand colour confirmation
from designer.



We’ve not finalised the sub brand service area logos – whether upper or
lower case – but mockups attached for reference.



They will be featured as;

- CIB Finance
- CIB Superannuation Services
- CIB Audit & Assurance
- CIB Business Advisory
- CIB Private Wealth



I’m driving out to the Southern tablelands this morning - contactable by
mobile, back online later in the day.

On Fri, Jun 13, 2025 at 8:30 AM Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Laura.



We've updated the design of the CIB Accountants landing page based on our
recent discussion.

You can view the updated design *here*
<https://www.figma.com/proto/okAjtsNUMqS2Ln8gzUKEAi/CIB-Accountants-%7C-Website-Design?page-id=67%3A778&node-id=6296-1752&viewport=46%2C987%2C0.23&t=41BBFDsHhFmxlbbI-1&scaling=min-zoom&content-scaling=fixed>
.



I also have attached the image for quick reference.

We hope the new design aligns with your vision. Please feel free to share
any feedback or additional revisions you'd like us to make — we're happy to
make adjustments as needed.

Looking forward to your thoughts!

--

Updates made:

- Updated Services Section — added more depth and content to each
service card (sub-services, micro-proof, CRO improvements based on client
feedback to avoid "vanilla" design).
- Updated Why Us Section (Trust Block) — included trust metrics like
"Established in 1985", staff count, office locations, and awards for
stronger authority and brand positioning.
- Updated Hero Section Header — Updated to new floating header style
with soft shadow, making it sticky and more visually integrated into the
hero section.
- Refined Hero Subheadline — added brand personality messaging: Big firm
expertise. Personalised service.
- Adjusted overall content alignment to reflect client feedback around
modernizing tone and adding more differentiation from other accountant
websites.
- Icon Updates - Updated to: stronger solid green icons with improved
contrast, clarity, and stronger visual presence

working on the landing page design. As previously discussed, we will apply
your new branding to the design. Yay!

color palette so we can apply them to the design? Logo not yet finalised –
we’re sticking with the same green and going with black instead of grey but
hope to have it decided in the next week or two.



If you also have any images or other assets you'd like us to use, feel free
to share those as well. In the meantime, we’re using stock photos as
placeholders.

We have updated profile pics and some team pics we could use. We’ll have

lead up to EOFY is hectic. Do you have somewhere I should load them or I’ll
share via dropbox?

Hi Laura!


I hope you had a great weekend!

Thank you for sharing the credentials.



Due to security restrictions, logging in requires an authentication code
sent to your email or phone. At the moment, we don’t need access to your
SiteGround account, but we’ll reach out if that changes.

We’ve set up the staging website on our server and have already started
working on the landing page design. As previously discussed, we will apply
your new branding to the design.

Could you please send us your new logo (if available) and your updated
color palette so we can apply them to the design?



If you also have any images or other assets you'd like us to use, feel free
to share those as well. In the meantime, we’re using stock photos as
placeholders.

I’ll send you an update once the first version of the design is ready.
We're excited to show you what we've been working on!

Let us know if you have any questions or additional input.

--



Cindy Valderama
